column1: '''Nessamelda''' was one of the [[Fragrant Trees]] which grew in [[Nísimaldar]] on the island of [[Númenor]]
column2: being brought there by the [[Elves]] of [[Eressëa]].<ref>{{UT|Numenor}}</ref>

column1: The word ''nessamelda'' means "Beloved of Nessa" in [[Quenya]] (from ''[[Nessa]]'' and ''[[melda]]''= "beloved").{{fact}}
